attr.name: nowrap
attr.description: If the value of this attribute is set to yes, the definition text will not wrap. The default value is no.

omission.description: The start tag is required. The end tag may be omitted if the <dd>Â element is immediately followed by another <dd> element, or if there is no more content in the parent element.

parents.description: <dl> or (in WHATWG HTML) a <div> that is inside a <dl>.
